page.title: 13Landscape.
page.content: The landscape around{Kyleakin}is mostly hills and sea .the hills are quite boggy and are covered in heather. The only historical ruins are the {Castle Moil}and the{War Memorial.}The Castle Moil is on a small hill at the edge of the sea .It is made of stone and mortar and is very old. Long long ago there used to be a chain from Kyleakin to Kyle,and every ship that came used to have to pay before they got passed. There is a lot of forestry in the area. Most of Kyleakin has got sea round it because it used to be an island. there is quite a strong current because the channel is not very wide.
